MONITOR PROGRESS

Real-Time Insights for Every Class

No more waiting for end-of-term reports. Get immediate access to chapter-wise completion and academic performance across all classes.

  • Track subject completion in real-time.
  • Identify top-performing classes and subjects.
  • Make data-driven decisions for academic planning.

Elmind's AI engine analyzes attendance, grades, and engagement to provide actionable insights. Proactively support students and staff, and build a smarter, more responsive school environment.
